channel.title: Problem with bones on altar

item.title: Problem with bones on altar
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

well i got a problem. if i use my bones on my altar nothing happens i got the code but still noghting happen is my code wrong or maybe i need to replace my altar delete this one and replace with another one. here is my code (ps: i maded code for all possible altar id’s)

if(UsedOnObjectID == 409){ if(ItemID == 526){ deleteItem(526, 1); addSkillXP(140*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 409){ if(ItemID == 532){ deleteItem(532, 1); addSkillXP(280*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } } if(UsedOnObjectID == 409){ if(ItemID == 536){ deleteItem(536, 1); addSkillXP(360*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } }

can someone help plz? i’m using a delta source (evolutionX v5)

Read full topic
